author: fwyzard
body:
- use prebuilt Java binaries (backport of #15928)
- add subtables supprt for ConfDB v2 (backport of #15922)

Includes #15836 (backport of #15837)
- update documentation
- fix choice of ConfDB v2 by default
- add support for the schema and database to hltIntegrationTest --setup
title: HLT tools: improve support for ConfDB v2 (updated)
